name: witheringly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that criticizes someone severely, or that is intended to make someone feel ashamed: He plays a witheringly cynical alcoholic who works in a law firm. His final reply was both witheringly sarcastic and gloriously triumphant.
More examplesFewer examplesAfter the match, the manager gave a witheringly blunt and honest assessment of the team's performance. "Are you going to need my help with that, too?" she said to him witheringly. Instead of being witheringly derisive about everything, maybe you can think of something constructive to say.
